replies.msg:
Q: If I buy 3 albums could I apply for tickets at all 3 concert locations using the same name?
Q: Does the section stating “* When more than one application is made under a single name, this will be counted as a single application.” apply to only one of the concert locations or to all?
Q: Does the section stating “Only one application may be carried out for each serial number.” mean that if I buy 2 albums and get 2 serial numbers, I can apply twice using the same name? Or is it not possible for 1 person to make multiple applications, regardless of the number of albums they apply?
(We also received a large number of other similar questions)

A: Multiple applications under the same name (using multiple serial numbers) will only count as 1 application, but you are able to list your preferences for the concert location, from your first preference through to your third.

當佢休息完2016年出返黎發覺佢可能真係經歷太多同生活體驗了更多，上一隻Fantome開始曲同詞都有所改變關於愛情嘅歌都開始多，係宇多田光另一個全新音樂階段，每首歌更有內涵更有味道。
可能曲同詞都不同以往，但我更喜歡現在的宇多田光
